ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] OT Complete heal (was Numbers on Bards)
ygData.msgSnippet: Interesting - I never have used my instruments during a fight. I m currently level 21 - actually now that I think about it, I m level 20, I died yesterday :(.
ygData.messageBody:
Interesting - I never have used my instruments during a fight. I'm currently
level 21 - actually now that I think about it, I'm level 20, I died
yesterday :(. Is just using my weapons in battle normal for my level? Should
I expect to be using my instruments a lot more often when I hit a certain
level?

I noticed that Denon's Disruptive Discord uses Brass instruments and I
haven't used the song yet. Is it a useful song? I don't really like to sing
AE songs in battle since it causes problems right quick - although I do like
Largos as it has a pretty small radius. Are all of our good songs going to
be AE? Denon's Disruptive Discord would be awesome if I could sing it
without fear that I'm going to pull everything in the zone...


----- Original Message -----
From: Daniel P. Sniderman <fuzzbone@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, January 22, 2001 2:19 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] OT Complete heal (was Numbers on Bards)


> And a lot of bards; granted there are a lot of people who LIKE using their
> weapons and more power to them (this is a game after all) - but I'm amazed
> by the number of group members who tell me that they've never seen a bard
> not using weapons during a fight (and I'm talking at places like
Sebelis)...
>
> Slyde
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4 [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
> Sent: Monday, January 22, 2001 3:36 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] OT Complete heal (was Numbers on Bards)
>
> Was camping the moat corners in Karnors this weekend. Had a warrior, a
> second bard, wizard, cleric and enchanter in the group. I was weaving the
> three chants (with Selos drum) during every fight. Based on the numbers
> posted on the www.eqsongs.com website, I was doing around 172pts of damage
> per tick (when all 3 stuck). As many people have stated before on this
> list, this is a helluva lot more damage than I can do with weapons
equipped.
> Like Minkin, I was doing so much damage to the mob that it almost always
> ignored the warrior and attacked me. Still amazes me though when other
> classes ask me why I am not meleeing with weapons. Even though the game
has
> been out for almost two years, there are still a lot of people who don't
> realize what all a bard can do.
>
> Galtin
